EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202302-HHS-HAC-INTERN'L-STROKE-CONF-2023.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Increase access to patients with telestroke
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US Meet us at the International Stroke Conference 2023
February 8-10 | Dallas, TX Image Mature African American woman in hospital bed
Stroke-related emergencies cost the U.S. health system more than $25 billion a year. 1 As hospital leaders search for ways to alleviate this burden, many have turned to telestroke solutions for relief.
More than just videoconferencing, the Teladoc Health telestroke program offers a comprehensive solution from the ambulance to the hospital—and beyond.
If you’re attending ISC 2023, we invite you to schedule a meeting <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/isc2023]]> or stop by booth 1018 <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/isc2023]]> to hear more about how our telestroke and other high-acuity solutions expand access to specialists and improve the healthcare experience for all.
Learn more about our stroke solutions <[[https://teladochealth.com/high-acuity/]]>
1 Yarnoff B, Khavjou O, Elmi J, Lowe-Beasley K, Bradley C, Amoozegar J, et al. Estimating Costs of Implementing Stroke Systems of Care and Data-Driven Improvements in the Paul Coverdell National Acute Stroke Program. Prev Chronic Dis 2019
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
